metadata.title: CVE-2022-42011 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in D-Bus before 1.12.24, 1.13.x and 1.14.x before1.14.4, and 1.15.x before 1.15.2. An authenticated attacker can causedbus-daemon and other programs that use libdbus to crash when receiving amessage where an array length is inconsistent with the size of the elementtype.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-42011` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dbus - 1.12.20-2ubuntu4.1
dbus-tests - 1.12.20-2ubuntu4.1
dbus-user-session - 1.12.20-2ubuntu4.1
dbus-x11 - 1.12.20-2ubuntu4.1
libdbus-1-3 - 1.12.20-2ubuntu4.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dbus package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.12.20-2ubuntu4.1').
